The Center Square  U.S PERIOD House Oversight Committee Chair Rep PERIOD James Comer RKy. released more evidence Wednesday that he says back allegations that President Joe Biden personally benefited from his brother and sons overseas business dealings saying he received  in 

Comer says the presidents son Hunter Biden who faces his own legal charges allegedly laundered the money from overseas business deals using his fathers name PERIOD That money came from a Chinese energy company CEFC PERIOD

It all began with a shakedown in the summer of  when Hunter Biden sent a message to his CEFC associate demanding a  million capital payment Comer said PERIOD As Hunter Biden extorted this associate Hunter claimed he was sitting with his father and that the Biden network would turn on his associate if he didnt pony up the money PERIOD The extortion scheme worked PERIOD Days later  flowed in from a Chinese affiliate of CEFC. two IRS whistleblowers testified before Congress earlier this year that the Biden family and associates raked in more than  million from overseas deals using about  shell companies PERIOD

Comer said money was moved through those accounts to make it hard to track PERIOD He laid out a timeline in his latest release of evidence PERIOD

First Northern International Capital a Chinese company associated with CEFC wired  to Hudson West III a joint venture established by Hunter Biden and a CEFC associate Comer said PERIOD

Comer said Hudson West III sent  to an entity owned and controlled by Hunter Biden. next Hunter Biden wired  to Lion Hall Group a company owned by Joe Bidens brother James and sisterinlaw Sara Biden he added PERIOD Sara Biden then withdrew  in cash from Lion Hall Group PERIOD Later the same day she deposited it into her and James Bidens personal checking account PERIOD A few days later Sara Biden cut a check to Joe Biden for  PERIOD The memo line of the check said loan repayment. this evidence comes after Comer released evidence last month that the president received a direct payment of  PERIOD Comer released a copy of a check apparently from James Biden Joe Bidens brother to the president for that amount with the memo loan repayment. comer said that payment came after James Biden received  in loans from Americore a struggling company that later filed bankruptcy PERIOD Comer points to the companys bankruptcy filings saying James Biden received these loans based upon representations that his last name Biden could open doors and that he could obtain a large investment from the Middle East based on his political connections. as The Center Square previously reported IRS whistleblowers previous bank records and FBI documents have been put forward in recent months by the House Oversight Committee providing evidence for allegations that the Biden family and associates received more than  million from entities in several countries including China Russia and Ukraine PERIOD

Biden has repeatedly denied that he benefited from any overseas dealings PERIOD This latest evidence drew more attacks against the president PERIOD Rep PERIOD Elise Stefanik RN.Y. called it a bombshell report and Rep PERIOD Russell Fry RS.C. blasted Biden saying he received laundered China money. joe said Hunter Biden never received money from China but turns out both Joe AND Hunter Biden received money he wrote on X formerly known as Twitter PERIOD

Originally published on thecentersquare.com part of the BLOX Digital Content Exchange PERIOD
